text: @Mike_Pence The sanctity of human life? Are you kidding? Not the 140,000 people dead of Covid-19 due to your incompetence. Not the soldiers killed for Putin’s bounty. Not the families separated and in cages at the border. And not the countless people of colour killed by police. Burn in Hell.
